title: Drawing, "Interior of St. Peter's Illuminated", before 1787
medium: Brush and watercolor over pen and ink on tan laid paper
description: Interior of Basilica of St. Peter's on Holy Thursday.  View is asymmetrical, from a position between the left side aisle and the nave.  Interior is illuminated by a large cross, composed of several hundred lit oil lamps, suspended in front of the Bernini baldichin.  Figures stand under the cross and scattered around the nave.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Interior of St. Peter's Illuminated", before 1787.
before 1787. Brush and watercolor over pen and ink on tan laid paper. Bequest of Joseph F. McCrindle. 2009-4-2.
